messages.msgSnippet: ... Not Nara nor Mito IMHO. Maybe one of the many Shoami, don t know. Looks like it s been dipped in heavy lacquer :-( Can probably remove it with acetone or
messages.messageBody:
--- In nihontostudy@yahoogroups.com, "bungotakadasword"
<MuramasaIII@a...> wrote:
> http://cgi.ebay.com/ws/eBayISAPI.dll?ViewItem&item=2551584689
>
> anyone has any idea as to " school " ?
> Nara ? Mito ? the all encompassing Shoami ?

Not Nara nor Mito IMHO. Maybe one of the many
Shoami, don't know. Looks like it's been dipped
in heavy lacquer :-( Can probably remove it with
acetone or nail polish remover. Nice design tho.

Rich S
------------------------------------------------------------
Richard Stein, PhD alchemyst@...

The Japanese Sword Index
http://www.geocities.com/alchemyst/nihonto.htm
------------------------------------------------------------
